title: "Undercovers" skin theme
body:
This would feature a series of skins playing on the word, 'Undercover.'  This theme of skins revolves around the League champions' nightwear.

{{champion:51}}  - Oversized t-shirt with giant floppy nightcap.  The t-shirt would be made to match the length of her skirt.
Piltover Peacemaker launches a pillow at high velocity.
Yordle Snap Trap holds a baggie of sleeping powder, spraying it all over the victim when it's set off.
90 Caliber Net throws a blanket.
Ace in the Hole plays the first few notes of a lullaby.

{{champion:222}} - Some kind of skimpy nightie.  Lots of frills and lace.

{{champion:254}} - Classic pajama pants and shirt.

{{champion:9}} - Mr. Sandman.

Lots of room for improvement/additions, feel welcome to comment!
